description: Fall hiking, cool-weather rock climbing, summer camping—the versatile Capa Jacket is here for it all. Made with Primaloft® Gold P.U.R.E. (Produced Using Reduced Emissions) 100% recycled synthetic insulation, this jacket retains warmth even when wet. To keep you really comfortable in weather, it also features a water-resistant recycled nylon shell. Packable, breathable, warm, the Capa is great for layering or as that jacket you bring on every adventure.
name: Cotopaxi Capa Insulated Hooded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 100% recycled 20D ripstop nylon with PFC-free DWR finish (40gsm)
